attributes.action: Release all No Deal Brexit planning documents to Parliament and the people.
attributes.additional_details: However, there are believed to be other Brexit planning documents, including about an actual worst-case scenario, which Parliament and the people need to make informed choices.
attributes.background: The Government has released an excerpt of a No Deal Brexit planning document called ‘Yellowhammer’, labelled as a ‘reasonable worst case planning assumptions’.
